page.title: 15Grundisburgh Arts and Crafts
page.content:
Skills Practised: Pottery, Carpentry, Flower Drying and Arranging, Fine Art, Musical Instrument Making, Embroidery, Making and Repair of Fine Furniture, Poetry.
Skills practised may form part of activities of Clubs and Societies mentioned in Recreation section. An Educational aspect subsists too.
Skills are practised by individuals and groups and may contain a semi- professional element.
There is an Art and Craft shop in the village but it is not possible to state the extent to which it provides retail outlet for local talent and expertise.
